√av 'favor'

present: [1.] ávati etc. V.+  

perfect: ā́va  ā́vitha etc. V.+  

aorist: [1.] avyās  avyāt   -- [5.] ā́vīt etc.  aviḍḍh etc.  aviṣat etc.  

future: [1.] aviṣyáti   -- [2.] avitā  

verbal: -ūta  ávitave  -ávya  

secondary: causative: ā́vayas  ā́vayat  

derivatives: áva  avana C.  ávas V.B.  avis-? RV.  avitṛ́ V.B.S.  -avitra B.S.  áviṣṭha RV.  ávi? V.+  -avī? V.  ūtí V.+  ū́ma V.B.S.  oma RV.  óman V.B.  omán V.+  

Common in v.; quite rare in later language.
